name: Flex Partner
description: I worked for Masterbase as a Flex Partner and participated in their internship program aimed at students nearing graduation from Computer Engineering or related fields. During my time there, my team and I developed Condomoonie, an application designed to streamline the management tasks of condominium administrators and their staff. Additionally, while at Masterbase, I identified previously unknown functionalities within the ecosystem as well as potential security vulnerabilities, which I subsequently reported to the team responsible for the design and development of the Masterbase ecosystem.
activities: Training and research to work with the Masterbase ecosystem
Proposing a project based on a real-world problem
Developing the application using the Masterbase ecosystem
Conducting research, creating videos, and preparing commercial presentations for the solution
Identifying and reporting new functionalities and potential security issues within the Masterbase ecosystem
